name: NationalFoodDay
0:
”Alexa, ask National Food Day about today.”
”Alexa, ask National Food Day when is Donut Day?”
”Alexa, ask National Food Day what is this month?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: national food day
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Organizations, companies, and brands have created culinary holidays to celebrate various foods and drinks. If you'd like to bring donuts to work on Donut Day, but keep forgetting when it is, this is the skill for you!
Features: 
-- Discover the national food day for today or any specified month and day.
-- Search though the list of food/drink days by name. 
-- Discover what national foods/drinks are celebrated in this month or in a specified month.

Try: 
When can I drink beer?
When is hamburger day?
what is the food for October? (many results!!)

Multiple results may be returned. 
When searching for a food, use the singular version, e.g. donut vs donuts.
If you find one missing or have any feature suggestions, let me know. 
Please show your support and interest by submitting your reviews and comments. If there is enough interest I will create updated/improved versions.

Source of data: foodimentary.com, nationaltoday.com, nationaldaycalendar.com
